Disabled: Setting to true disables the module
ServerModuleName: Defines name of the module responsible for signup
HashModuleName: Defines hash of the module responsible for signup
CustomLogoUrl: Defines URL of logo image used on signup page
InfoText: Defines additional text message shown on signup page
BottomInfoHtmlText: Defines bottom text message shown on signup page
DomainList: Defines list of domains signup feature is available for
